post.content_html:
Gloves fall into the category of the priciest cosmetic items in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive. Throughout the years, these collectibles have turned into a sought-after status symbol within the gaming community.

Most players desire to acquire a pair for themselves, but the price is often strikingly high. In this overview, we will take a closer look at the ten best expensive CS:GO gloves and shine a spotlight on why these collectibles are so valuable and why gamers across the globe are so eager to acquire them.

In article you will find:

  • What Are CS:GO Gloves?
  • What Factors Influence the Price of CS:GO Gloves?
  • Top 10 Most Expensive Gloves in CS:GO
  • Driver Gloves | Crimson Weave
  • Specialist Gloves | Fade
  • Specialist Gloves | Tiger Strike
  • Specialist Gloves | Emerald Web
  • Specialist Gloves | Crimson Kimono
  • Driver Gloves | King Snake
  • Sport Gloves | Superconductor
  • Sport Gloves | Hedge Maze
  • Sport Gloves | Vice
  • Sport Gloves | Pandora’s Box
  • Wrapping Up!
  • FAQs

What Are CS:GO Gloves?

In Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, gloves are cosmetic items that gamers can collect and equip in-game. While these hand accessories are purely cosmetic, meaning they don’t affect the gameplay or give any advantages to the player, they are coveted for their uniqueness and visual appeal. Some gloves are so rare and popular that they can fetch high prices in the game’s marketplace.

CS:GO gloves are used to customize the appearance of a player’s in-game character , specifically the character’s hands. Just like skins for guns, gloves come in various designs and rarity levels, making some of them highly sought after by players.

You can acquire your pair of coveted gloves in a variety of ways, such as by unlocking weapon cases, for which you need to purchase keys. However, on third-party CS:GO case opening websites like Hellcase, you do not need any keys to open containers and claim your drops. Check out the CS:GO Gloves Case on our platform.

What Factors Influence the Price of CS:GO Gloves?

The gloves’ prices can fluctuate significantly on the Steam Market and other external trading sites. Some particularly rare and sought-after gloves can fetch prices in the hundreds or even thousands of dollars, establishing them as a marker of prestige in the gaming world.

Some of the factors that influence the price of CS:GO gloves include their rarity, condition, and supply-demand ratio.

The rarity of the gloves is often the most significant factor. Rare CS:GO gloves drop significantly less often and are harder to obtain, so they usually command higher prices. The float value of the pair also affects the price tag: the condition of an item can vary from “Battle-Scarred” to “Factory New”, and gloves in better condition are usually more expensive.

Top 10 Most Expensive Gloves in CS:GO

We have scoured the market to compile the list of the ten best expensive CS:GO gloves and share these gems with you.

  • Sport Gloves | Pandora’s Box
  • Sport Gloves | Vice
  • Driver Gloves | King Snake
  • Sport Gloves | Superconductor
  • Specialist Gloves | Crimson Kimono
  • Sport Gloves | Hedge Maze
  • Specialist Gloves | Fade
  • Driver Gloves | Crimson Weave
  • Specialist Gloves | Tiger Strike
  • Specialist Gloves | Emerald Web

Now, let’s take a closer look at each pair and find out what makes them so special and expensive.

Driver Gloves | Crimson Weave

Driver Gloves | Crimson Weave showcases a checkered pattern made with red leather and dark brown suede. On the palm side, there is a blue fabric insert with a honeycomb pattern.

The pricing for Driver Gloves | Crimson Weave in Factory New condition starts at $3,600. Minimal Wear pairs cost $950.

Specialist Gloves | Fade

Like other gloves in this style, Specialist Gloves | Fade is made of texture fabric, and it features rubberized blue, red, and orange gradient inserts. There are dark gray reinforcements on the fingers and the palm side.

The rarest variants of these gloves have the least amount of yellow, and the pricing for the Factory New pairs starts at $5,000. Specialist Gloves | Fade in Minimal Wear condition sell for around $1,500.

Specialist Gloves | Tiger Strike

If you are into the wild spirit and animalistic patterns, Specialist Gloves | Tiger Strike will be a great choice. These orange-and-brown gloves are available in all conditions, and their pattern index influences the base texture overlay.

Factory New Specialist Gloves | Tiger Strike variants are worth over $6,000, and Minimal Wear gloves sell for $2,300. This item is available in the Eternal CS:GO Case , so check it out.

Specialist Gloves | Emerald Web

The top part of Specialist Gloves | Emerald Web is crafted from dark green and gray materials and decorated with a textured light green pattern that resembles a spider web.

Minimal Wear variants of Emerald Web gloves sell for more than $2,300. Factory New gloves are also available in the market, costing around $7,500. You can get this accessory for $2 only from our Glove CS:GO Case!

Specialist Gloves | Crimson Kimono

The black-and-red Specialist Gloves | Crimson Kimono was added to Counter-Strike: Global Offensive in 2016. They are made of black fabric adorned with vibrant geometrical patterns.

Specialist Gloves | Crimson Kimono in Factory New condition sells for $12,000. This cosmetic item is obtainable from the Gloves CS:GO Case.

Driver Gloves | King Snake

If you are not into flashy designs but still want to get an elegant pair of CS:GO gloves, pay attention to Driver Gloves | King Snake . Made in light beige leather and adorned with an animalistic pattern of snakeskin, they are on the list of the most expensive gloves in CS:GO.

According to the public data, there are only 91 Factory New Driver Gloves | King Snake variants in existence. They are extremely rare, costing around $14,000 for an item. Claim your pair of snakeskin gloves from our exclusive Gloves Case today!

Sport Gloves | Superconductor

Looking for a pair of top CS:GO gloves that will suit a loadout in almost any color? Check out Sport Gloves | Superconductor , a black-and-gray accessory adorned with electric blue highlights on both the upper and the palm sides.

There are only 30 pairs of Factory New Sport Gloves | Superconductor in existence, and there are twice less active offers on the market starting at $19,900 for an item. Minimal Wear variants sell for a bit over $5,000.

Sport Gloves | Hedge Maze

If you fancy expensive CS:GO gloves and you want to get a vibrant pair, take a closer look at Sport Gloves | Hedge Maze . This pair was first introduced to Counter-Strike: Global Offensive in 2016, and the item has gained a lot of popularity among the community since then.

Minimal Wear Sport Gloves | Hedge Maze sell for $10,000, while Factory New variants cost more than $25,000. Get the best CS:GO gloves for $169 only by opening the Gloves Case on our platform.

Sport Gloves | Vice

Perfect for neon-themed loadouts, Sport Gloves | Vice features a combination of black-and-pink textured materials that adorns the top part of these gloves, enriched by gentle blue highlights. The palm side features a unique abstract pattern in hues of blue and gray, decorated with black inserts sewn with pink threads.

Sport Gloves | Vice are among the most expensive gloves in CS:GO, and this item is extremely well-liked by CS:GO community and pro players. Factory New variant of these gloves is worth almost $23,000, so it might be worth trying to unbox them from a case. You can find Sport Gloves | Vice in The Clutch Case and our exclusive Gloves CS:GO Case.

Sport Gloves | Pandora’s Box

One of the game’s best pairs, Sport Gloves | Pandora’s Box , was introduced alongside the Brothers in Arms update. These eye-catching athletic gloves showcase a vibrant black-and-purple pattern on the upper side and stitched black inserts on the palm side.

Factory New variants of Sport Gloves | Pandora’s Box are one of the rarest gloves in CS:GO, as there are only 28 pairs in existence, and their price starts at $60,000. Meanwhile, the price for Minimal Wear variants is around $18,000. These gloves are guaranteed to get everyone’s attention on the server!

Wrapping Up!

Whether you’re a seasoned player aiming for the rarest pair of top CS:GO gloves or a casual gamer simply appreciating their design and rarity, these gloves will surely become a great addition to your in-game arsenal. So, while their price tags may be steep, the joy and prestige they bring to every match are priceless.

Check out all of these gloves on our website and explore our blog for more content about CS:GO skins and other cosmetic items, in-depth game guides, and esports news. Stay tuned, gamer!

FAQ s

What are the most expensive gloves?

Currently, the most expensive CS:GO gloves are Sport Gloves | Pandora’s Box. Factory New variants of this item are extremely rare, and their price on third-party trading platforms starts at $60,000.

What are the best gloves in CS:GO?

Our top-10 list of the best CS:GO Gloves includes:
Sport Gloves | Pandora’s Box
Sport Gloves | Vice
Driver Gloves | King Snake
Sport Gloves | Superconductor
Specialist Gloves | Crimson Kimono
Sport Gloves | Hedge Maze
Specialist Gloves | Fade
Driver Gloves | Crimson Weave
Specialist Gloves | Tiger Strike
Specialist Gloves | Emerald Web

How expensive are gloves in CSGO?

The price of gloves in CS:GO can vary widely, ranging from a $50 tag to several thousand dollars, depending on their rarity, condition, and demand within the gaming community.

What is the rarest glove in CSGO?

The rarest CS:GO gloves are Sport Gloves | Pandora’s Box in the Factory New condition. According to public data, only 28 pairs of Factory New variants in this design currently exist, and their minimal price is $60,000.
